title: Calories in Sausage Egg McMuffin
meta_description: Discover calories in sausage egg mcmuffin, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Sausage Egg McMuffin: English muffin, pork sausage patty, folded egg, American cheese; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and custom orders. Check McDonald's app or packaging for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One Sausage Egg McMuffin has 480 kcal, 21 g protein, and 31 g fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a sausage egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: About 480 kcal for the standard version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in sausage egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Approximately 21 g of protein per sandwich.

faqs.q: Is sausage egg mcmuffin high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 830 mg sodium, mostly from sausage and cheese.
Roughly 30 g carbs, including 2 g fiber from the muffin.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower calorie sausage egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Yes, skip cheese or use turkey sausage to reduce by 50-100 kcal.
